articles.description: Hotels in Greater Noida are charging exorbitant rates, exceeding five times their regular charges, ahead of the Moto GP event in September. Organisers have expressed their concerns about the inflated rates and are seeking reasonable accommodation options for …
articles.content: By Abhishek Anand: The upcoming Moto GP event in Greater Noida has led to a spike in demand for hotel rooms and a surge in room tariffs. A meeting was held between the organisers and government offic… [+1186 chars]
